event.title: is celebrated every 25th day of November

data.event: The feast of the town is celebrated every 25th day of November to celebrate the feast day of Saint Catherine of Alexandria (town's patron saint).

event.title: known as "El Mestizo" to the place now

data.event: When the Augustinians were busy with the Christianization of the Ilocos Region, a group of missionaries sailed westward through the river known as "El Mestizo" to the place now called Santa Catalina.
